com.camerontec.catalys.server.security.auth.login

Class LoginModuleConfigurationInMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.security.auth.login.Configuration
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.security.auth.login.LoginModuleConfigurationInMemory

  • public class LoginModuleConfigurationInMemory
extends Configuration
    Class to simulate a login module configuration for use by the LoginContext.

    This class supports the refresh() capability by maintaining separate live and pending configurations. Clients running in separate threads may concurrently be using the existing live configuration and building a new pending configuration. The pending configuration becomes the live configuration when refresh() is called. This implies that refresh() must be called to active the initial configuration as well.

    See Also:
    Configuration
